CHAT.comment: ENTERGY CORPORATION, Petitioner v. RIVERKEEPER, INC., ET AL.; and PSEG FOSSIL LLC, ET AL., Petitioners v. RIVERKEEPER, INC., ET AL.; and UTILITY WATER ACT GROUP, Petitioner v. RIVERKEEPER, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DARYL JOSEFFER ON BEHALF OF THE ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, ET AL., SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MAUREEN E. MAHONEY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD J. LAZARUS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DARYL JOSEFFER ON BEHALF OF THE ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, ET AL., SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
